Description: Limestone ostracon with 7 lines of text on recto and 8 lines on verso containing a letter.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (211-214, pl.25)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392627) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392627)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 24 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
